mapper.select: select distinct a.content from maoding_web_const a where a.type=8
select a.* from maoding_web_company_property a where a.deleted!=1 and a.company_id is null order by a.sequencing
select a.id,a.field_name,a.unit_name,a.sequencing,if(a.deleted!=1 and a.be_selected=1,0,-1) as change_status from maoding_web_company_property a where a.company_id=#{companyId} order by a.sequencing
select a.id,a.field_name,a.unit_name,a.sequencing,0 as change_status from maoding_web_company_property a where a.deleted!=1 and a.company_id=#{companyId} and a.be_default=1 order by a.sequencing

select a.id,a.field_name,a.unit_name,a.unit_id,a.sequencing,0 as change_status from maoding_web_company_property a where a.deleted!=1 and a.company_id=#{companyId} and a.be_default!=1 order by a.sequencing
mapper.update:
update maoding_web_company_property
field_name=#{fieldName},
unit_name=#{unitName},
be_selected=#{beSelected,jdbcType=TINYINT},
be_default=#{beDefault,jdbcType=TINYINT},
sequencing=#{sequencing},
deleted=#{deleted}
update_date=#{updateDate},
update_date=now(),
update_by=#{updateBy},
where id = #{id}
